What kind of story do you want this to be?

Random Shrink:
Neither you nor your giant(s) are aware of how you shrunk. You try to get the attention of someone who might be able to help you. This option should be primarily unaware. You may introduce random instances or factors that make you shrink or grow, become indestructible, etc. as long as it starts off with you not knowing.

You shrunk yourself:
You have a device that allows you to change your size, indestructibility, whether or not people are able to notice you, or other mind alterations, and pretty much anything else you can think of. This should be primarily unaware but you may pretty much do anything. Remember, you have the device, so you remain in control of the situation

They shrunk you:
Your giant shrinks you for whatever purpose he may have. He has a device that can control your size, indestructibility, and even mind. This story should start out aware, but can go to unaware if you want.

They grow into a giant:
It could be random, or an experiment gone wrong (or right), anything to make the giant grow. Unaware or aware is fine. You do not have to be the focal character in this, but a third-person narrating the giant's actions.
